devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team
devdoc.details: The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with Relay Encoder We follow this same interface including four-byte function selectors, in the precompile that wraps the pallet

params.rewardDestination: : the account that should receive the reward

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call
The bytes associated with the encoded call
The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.sender: : The paraId from which we want to accept the channel

params.maxCapacity: : The maximum capacity for the channel
params.maxMessageSize: : The maximum message size for the channel
params.recipient: : The paraId to whom we want to initiate the open channel

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.nominees: : An array of AccountIds corresponding to the accounts we will nominate

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call
The bytes associated with the encoded call
The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.rewardDestination: : the account that should receive the reward

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call
The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.blocked: : Whether or not the validator is accepting more nominations
params.comission: : Comission of the validator as partsPerBillion

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.slashes: Weight hint, number of slashing spans

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call

devdoc.title: Pallet Relay Encoder Interface
